mapper.select: SELECT /* RetrieveRoomInformationList */ RM_ID AS "roomID" , RM_NM AS "roomName" , RM_DESC AS "roomDesc" , BUILDING AS "building" , FLOOR AS "floor" , STCD AS "statusCode" , FRST_REG_DT AS "firstRegisterDate" , FRST_REG_TIME AS "firstRegisterTime" , LAST_CHNG_DT AS "lastChangeDate" , LAST_CHNG_TIME AS "lastChangeTime" FROM FRST.RM_INFO WHERE (RM_NM ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKey}, '') || '%' OR RM_ID ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKey}, '') || '%' OR RM_DESC ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKey}, '') || '%' OR BUILDING ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKey}, '') || '%' OR FLOOR::TEXT ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKey}, '') || '%') AND STCD <> '02' ORDER BY STCD , RM_ID DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT /* RetrieveRoomInformationTotalCount */ COUNT(*) AS "totalCount" FROM FRST.RM_INFO WHERE (RM_NM ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKey}, '') || '%' OR RM_ID ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKey}, '') || '%' OR RM_DESC ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKey}, '') || '%' OR BUILDING ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKey}, '') || '%' OR FLOOR::TEXT ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKey}, '') || '%') AND STCD <> '02'

SELECT /* RetrieveRoomInformationDetail */ RM_ID AS "roomID" , RM_NM AS "roomName" , RM_DESC AS "roomDesc" , BUILDING AS "building" , FLOOR AS "floor" , STCD AS "statusCode" FROM FRST.RM_INFO WHERE RM_ID = #{roomID} AND STCD <> '02' LIMIT 1
SELECT /* RetrieveLastRoomID */ RM_ID AS "roomID" FROM FRST.RM_INFO ORDER BY RM_ID DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT /* RegisterRoomInformation */ INTO FRST.RM_INFO ( RM_ID , RM_NM , RM_DESC , BUILDING , FLOOR , STCD , FRST_REG_DT , FRST_REG_TIME , LAST_CHNG_DT , LAST_CHNG_TIME) VALUES ( #{roomID} , COALESCE(#{roomName}, '') , COALESCE(#{roomDesc}, '') , COALESCE(#{building}, '') , COALESCE(#{floor}, 0) , COALESCE(#{statusCode}, '') , COALESCE(#{firstRegisterDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{firstRegisterTime}, '') , COALESCE(#{lastChangeDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{lastChangeTime}, ''))
mapper.update: UPDATE /* UpdateRoomInformation */ FRST.RM_INFO SET RM_NM = COALESCE(#{roomName}, RM_NM) , RM_DESC = COALESCE(#{roomDesc}, RM_DESC) , BUILDING = COALESCE(#{building}, BUILDING) , FLOOR = COALESCE(#{floor}, FLOOR) , STCD = COALESCE(#{statusCode}, STCD) , LAST_CHNG_DT = COALESCE(#{lastChangeDate}, LAST_CHNG_DT) , LAST_CHNG_TIME = COALESCE(#{lastChangeTime}, LAST_CHNG_TIME) WHERE RM_ID = #{roomID} AND STCD <> '02'
